qas.question: Who is the Transport Minister in Canada?
How much is the U.S. Customs plaza expected to cost?
How much is the Gordie Howe International Bridge expected to cost?
When is the Gordie Howe International Bridge expected to open?
How much of the Gordie Howe International Bridge is Canada going to pay for?

context: On February 18, 2015, Canadian Transport Minister <a0_0>Lisa Raitt<a0_0/> announced that Canada has agreed to pay the entire cost to build a <a1_0>$250 million<a1_0/> U.S. Customs plaza adjacent to the planned new Detroit–Windsor bridge, now the Gordie Howe International Bridge. Canada had already planned to pay for <a4_0>95 per cent<a4_0/> of the bridge, which will cost <a2_0>$2.1 billion<a2_0/>, and is expected to open in <a3_0>2020<a3_0/>. "This allows Canada and Michigan to move the project forward immediately to its next steps which include further design work and property acquisition on the U.S. side of the border," Raitt said in a statement issued after she spoke in the House of Commons.
